resources.string:
1. Use app for measuring speed of object coming at, or going away from, the camera.
 2. Hold camera at 1.22 m height.
 3. When obj reaches landmark 1, hit Set Time 1.
 4. When obj reaches landmark 2, hit Set Time 2.
 5. Aim camera at the ground at landmark 1, hit Set Dist 1.
 6. Aim camera at the ground at landmark 2, hit Set Dist 2.
 7. If you mess up, you can reset your numbers.
 8. Hit calculate speed and you will be shown speed of obj between landmarks.
